rules: Rule1: Either grizzly bears have habitat in the protected forest or the Habitat Protection Act passes
Rule2: If the conservation agency monitors wildlife, then should Congress fail to approve the budget, the conservation agency issues a public alert
Rule3: If the conservation agency enforces restrictions, then the conservation agency establishes a protected zone
Rule4: If the conservation agency documents species, then the conservation agency does not face a legal challenge
Rule5: If the conservation agency partners with NGOs, then the conservation agency creates wildlife corridors
Rule6: If the conservation agency launches an awareness campaign, then provided that the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, the conservation agency partners with NGOs
Rule7: Either the conservation agency receives public support or the conservation agency launches an awareness campaign
Rule8: If the conservation agency secures grants, then the conservation agency expands operations
Rule9: Either the conservation agency secures grants or the conservation agency faces funding cuts
Rule10: If the conservation agency faces funding cuts, then the conservation agency does not receive public support
Rule11: If the conservation agency complies with the law, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
Rule12: Either the conservation agency complies with the law or the conservation agency meets requirements
Rule13: Either the conservation agency reduces efforts or if the conservation agency meets requirements, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
Rule14: If the conservation agency faces criticism, then the conservation agency does not reduce efforts
Rule15: Either the conservation agency maintains facilities or if the conservation agency meets requirements, then the Habitat Protection Act passes
Rule16: If the protected forest maintains biodiversity, then the grizzly bear population is stable
Rule17: If the conservation agency adapts its strategy, then when the conservation agency experiences a setback occurs, the conservation agency does not maintain facilities
Rule18: If the conservation agency succeeds long-term, then the conservation agency adapts its strategy
Rule19: Either the conservation agency conducts research or if the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, then the conservation agency receives funding
Rule20: If Congress approves the budget, then the conservation agency does not conduct research

Rule21: If it is not the case that grizzly bears having habitat in the protected forest leads to the protected forest maintaining biodiversity, then the conservation agency does not initiate an emergency survey

Rule22: If it is not the case that either the conservation agency achieves targets or the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency receiving funding, then the conservation agency receives recognition

Rule23: If it is not the case that either the conservation agency achieves targets or the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency receiving funding, then the conservation agency does not receive recognition

Rule24: If it is not the case that the failure of grizzly bears having habitat in the protected forest to lead to the protected forest maintaining biodiversity results in the conservation agency initiating an emergency survey, then the conservation agency implements a breeding program
Rule25: If it is not the case that the Habitat Protection Act not passing leads to the conservation agency enforcing restrictions, then the conservation agency faces a legal challenge
Rule26: If the Habitat Protection Act does not pass, then the conservation agency does not establish a protected zone
facts: Fact1: The conservation agency monitors wildlife
Fact2: The conservation agency documents species
Fact3: The conservation agency faces criticism
Fact4: The conservation agency experiences a setback
Fact5: The conservation agency succeeds long-term
Fact6: The conservation agency does not create wildlife corridors
Fact7: The conservation agency does not expand operations
Fact8: The grizzly bear population is not stable
Fact9: The conservation agency does not achieve targets
Fact10: The conservation agency does not implement a breeding program
Fact11: The conservation agency does not receive funding
Fact12: The conservation agency does not issue a public alert
